subject: Response to RFI
body:
Good morning, Caroline, 
 
First, I would like to introduce myself virtually.  Thank you for Flock�s response to our recent RFI that closed on December 11th.  
 
We are in the process of reviewing responses.  I am sending this email you with the attached City of Eugene IT Software review questions.  These are more specific questions that our IT would need answered in a review.  
 
 
Jake Burke
Captain � Investigations Division
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541) 682-5895 work
